content.description: (NW-facing) Climb up to gain the left-leaning granite ramp, follow until it becomes vertical.  Climb past two bolts to gain the schist-crack system.  Follow the schist cracks until you are able to traverse right to the slight bulge.  Pull the bulge and follow the 6 bolts to the summit anchors.  She is absolutely amazing, a true adventure, she gets spicey, and if you screw up, there will be consequences.
content.protection: Red C3 - #3, Nuts, Long Slings, & 8 bolts.     DESCENT: 2 Rope Rappel (2-bolt anchor)
content.location: Located on the NW face of PROFILE ROCK, approx 45' climbers' left of the Profile in the alcove.

content.description: The perfect place if you want to capture some climbing photos with America's First President in the background.
